text: It seems Julia Roberts and Danny Moder may be headed for divorce. When the actress took the part of a worker at a secret government facility on Homecoming, an upcoming political thriller on Amazon, she knew just who she wanted as her co - star : her old pal Dermot Mulroney. She lobbied for him to join the show, and on March 8, it was officially announced that Dermot, 54 — who starred with Julia in My Best Friend's Wedding and August : Osage County — would play her character's boyfriend. Julia and Dermot. ( Photo Credit : Getty Images ) She was thrilled. Her husband? Furious. ` ` Julia's reunion with Dermot hasn't gone down well with Danny,'' an insider tells Life & Style. `
